Class TradeHistory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gracehoppers.jlovas.bookwrm.TradeHistory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class TradeHistory
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Holds all the trades ever because a history of trades is everything Current and past trades, as specified in OS 20. Contains methods addTrade and get TradebyIndex
    See Also:
